title: Next Friday
description: A streetwise man flees South Central Los Angeles, heading to the suburbs and his lottery-winner uncle and cousin, to avoid a neighborhood thug with a grudge who has just escaped from prison.

reviews.text: This movie was absolutely hilarious. I laughed my ass off.

This is the definition of sequels not living up to the original and I think it is mainly due to the absence of Chris Tucker. Epps plays Dae Dae, who is the best new character the film gives us. Try to overlook the stereotypes.
This movie was hilarious. I was seriously laughing my tail end off the entire time. Day-Day was such a great character and of course our very own Craig Jones (Ice Cube).

While it may not lived up to the expectations of first I thoroughly enjoyed it, Day-Day is a new addition (shame no Smokey) but they do well to establish him and his character is different. They done good.
Great movie, but the edge was not as cunning and funny as the other one was.
Not as good as the first. Still really hilarious. This movie could have been the funniest movie ever made if Chris Tucker was in it too.
Still very enjoyable today people hate on it but I personally love and adore this film.
